response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Given its significance, we are extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,200,000. We understand that the product's worth to you might be valued at $800,000, but we hope this price will still provide you with a substantial benefit while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties.

Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We are confident that this product will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
